sentences: Kennedy Edwin is a founding member of the Bornean hard rock band Masterpiece (Masterjam 2003â€“2005).
He formed the band with his brother Willy Edwin (lead guitar) in 2003 along with Watt Marcus and Roni joining as bassist and drummer, respectively.
Edwin was the lead singer for the band until 2005, when he began to focus on his guitar playing, he and Willy recruited Depha as the vocalist for the band.
